title: WTB: Down to 2 T206 PSA NY Americans

posts.post_title: WTB: Down to 2 T206 PSA NY Americans
posts.post_content:
I am down to 2 (well really 3, but 2 in reality) for my set:
Joe Doyle (just the one I can afford for now unless you are very generous) PSA 4 or better
Red Kleinow (catching) PSA 5 or better
[STRIKE]Jack Knight (Portrait) PSA 5 or better[/STRIKE]
Currently I am ranked #3 set and have a lot of upgrading to catch #2...

Here is a link to my set if interested:

[url]http://www.psacard.com/PSASetRegistry/publishedset.aspx?s=97637[/url]

Thanks,

Tim
I have a Knight Portrait PSA 5 $95.00 shipped. Thanks Daryl
